channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: How to Use AMD FSR 4 in Virtually Every Game That Supports DLSS
item.dc:creator: Goran Damnjanovic
item.description: AMD couldn’t do it, but the community sure did.
item.content:encoded: I love my RX 9070 XT graphics card, but the glacial pace at which FSR 4 gets adopted leaves a sour taste in my mouth. Luckily, the community is here to the rescue with a tool that injects FSR 4 to virtually every game that supports DLSS. It’s straightforward to use and has become a staple on my PC.

item.title: The Best Mel Brooks Movies of All Time, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Chris Hachey
item.description: Comedy is timeless, and Mel Brooks is just that.
item.content:encoded: Mel Brooks has had a storied comedic career, going back to his days of writing for variety shows like Your Show of Shows and Caesar's Hour. His partnerships with Carl Reiner and Sid Caesar helped launch his acting and directorial careers. He is mostly regarded for his films of the 1970s and 1980s, but plenty more have become mainstream successes.

item.title: Everything We Know About the Upcoming Ioniq 6 N So Far
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: All the latest info on Hyundai’s upcoming Ioniq 6 N performance EV, from power and design to features and release expectations.
item.content:encoded: Hyundai’s high-performance N division is preparing to take its next bold step into the electric era, and enthusiasts are watching closely. Following the success of the Ioniq 5 N, the upcoming Ioniq 6 N promises to blend the sleek styling of the standard sedan with the power, handling, and excitement that define the brand’s performance lineup.

item.title: Linux fd Command: 10 Terminal File Search Methods
item.dc:creator: Bobby Jack
item.description: Find the smallest needles in the largest haystack.
item.content:encoded: The fd program is an alternative to find, which can search the file system using various patterns. It has many options to support a wide range of use cases, making it easy to find any type of file, regardless of your requirements.

item.title: iOS 26's Biggest Disappointment Is Last Year's Big Selling Point
item.dc:creator: Nick deCourville
item.description: "Hey, Siri? Can you generate an image of me lowering my expectations?"
item.content:encoded: Despite it being the talk of the town last year, it feels like Apple Intelligence is losing steam. Between a practical no-show at this year's big iPhone event and little attention being paid to its iOS 26 updates, it's hard not to feel a little disappointed that one feature still has glaringly obvious issues.

item.title: Windows 11's Paint, Snipping Tool, and Notepad Apps Are About to Get New Features
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.content:encoded: It’s always a good day when Windows’ default apps get updates. Brand-new versions of apps like Paint, Snipping Tool, and Notepad are coming, and they have a healthy amount of new features you need to check out.

item.title: 12 macOS Tahoe Settings to Change Right Away
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.description: From themes and Liquid Glass to Spotlight and Control Center.
item.content:encoded: Apple has finally unleashed a brand new version of macOS, with a standardized version number and a fresh, glassy look. In addition to the obvious differences, macOS 26 Tahoe has a few extra settings you might want to tweak compared to the previous release.

item.title: I Leaned on the Amazfit Balance 2 for All Things Health and Wellness — Here’s How It Did
item.dc:creator: Michael Bizzaco
item.description: Three cheers for the wearable underdog.
item.content:encoded: The Amazfit Balance 2 is proof that third-party wearables can be just as impressive as the mainline competition. This fitness watch delivers remarkable battery life, smooth-running software, and more health and wellness features than you’ll know what to do with. It also looks fantastic and is comfortable to wear.

item.title: Toyota, Lexus, and Subaru Issue Repair Recall—Here’s What to Know
item.dc:creator: Adam Gray
item.description: Toyota, Lexus and Subaru EVs face fresh recalls over heating system flaws, extending a wave of recent safety notices for the automakers.
item.content:encoded: Lexus, Toyota, and Subaru drivers are facing not one but two new recalls that could impact whether their cars are safe to drive.

item.title: You Home Screen Is Getting in “Shape” With the Latest Android 16 Beta
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.description: A fresh look for your Android home screen is on the horizon...
item.content:encoded: Android 16 has been officially available for a few months now, but the beta program is still going strong. The second beta for the upcoming quarterly release (QPR2) has just been released for Pixel phones, and it has some cool goodies.
